column4: How can I verify that I have NFS exports set up properly?  I cannot connect from my client machine (mac os x)
i modified my iptables rules to allow all traffic from my lan-facing interface
I will pastebin the exports file momentarily
have you tried doing it per ip instead of a whole block at a time?
okay, I'd pick an ip that's already assigned and try that
I'm not sure if using CIDR notation is correct syntax or not
i was able to mount it in mac os x, but when i try to ls /Volumes/backup/ it says permission denied
it's possible that one or more of the flags you have set are restricting too much
that is, the flags in () after the ip
not offhand, I'd pull up a manpage and see which each one does
